release_name: Multi-SDR Hardware Support (FTDI UATRadio) - Fully Fixed
release_notes: BUG FIX: Removed all external command dependencies from detection script. Replaced final 'cat' and 'tee' commands with shell built-ins for complete reliability. Detection now works in all environments without any external command dependencies. FEATURES: Full FTDI UATRadio support, enhanced setup wizard with device type badges, smart configuration with automatic driver selection, seamless multi-SDR support for mixed hardware setups.
